rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance hall with decorative wooden panels and stone flooring.
Open-plan living area combined with kitchen; designed for a spacious environment reflecting traditional Kerala aesthetics.
Adjacent to the living area, providing a seamless transition between dining and socializing spaces.
Bedroom placed in a location with optimal Vastu alignment for health and prosperity; includes built-in storage and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom ensuring natural lighting; designed to be adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience.
Third bedroom with sufficient space and privacy; includes a small study area if desired.
Common bathroom facility for the ground floor bedrooms, adhering to local building norms.
Quiet study and reading area integrated into the living space; designed with adequate natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings.

Sliding door connecting the open-plan kitchen to the living area.
